description: Changeset 191 on trunk ("Use default kernel and ramdisk properly by default.") puts a call to get_image before the parameters are read from the API call.  This means that the euca-run-instances --kernel and --ramdisk flags no longer work at all.
title: API kernel/ramdisk parameters no longer work

comments.content: Changeset 191 on trunk ("Use default kernel and ramdisk properly by default.") puts a call to get_image before the parameters are read from the API call.  This means that the euca-run-instances --kernel and --ramdisk flags no longer work at all.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ewanmellor
